
# About the project

*During the course we will learn how to use open data and open research tools tool. We will understand the principles, advantages and possibilities for using these open research tools (Rstudio, Github, RMarkDown). Following methods will be used during the course: Regression models, Clustering and classification, Discriminant analysis (DA), K-means clustering (KMC), Dimensionality reduction techniques, Principal component analysis (PCA), Multiple Correspondence analysis (MCA)*
